thread.title: Fox Offers to Insulate Sky News to Mollify British Regulators

author: Stu Woo
title: Fox Offers to Insulate Sky News to Mollify British Regulators
text:
LONDON—21st Century Fox Inc. offered to bolster the editorial independence of Sky PLC’s news operations to meet concerns of British regulators and ease approval of its $16 billion bid for the portion of the pay TV giant it doesn’t already own.
The offer is the latest move in what has become an important side show to the separate, $52 billion bid by Walt Disney Co. for a big chunk of Fox assets, including its 39% stake in Sky. The two deals aren’t technically connected, but Disney views Sky as an important component of its...
